Feb. 8, 1981 D Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival (Championship Section)
Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival (Championship Section) 1 Entertainments Contest Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival milton-keynes-brass-band-festival-championship-sec
Set Test and Entertainments Contest
Music for Brass
Stantonbury Leisure Centre Sports Hall, Milton Keynes Bands played an entertainment programme including Scherzo from Music For Brass. 1st Prize: £300.00 (Mk Co-Op trophy) 2nd Prize: £150.00 (Legal & General trophy) 3rd Prize: £75.00 (Mk trophy) 13 bands competed
